Instructions to command the robot in simulation:

- "i": Put the arm in the initial configuration
- "v" : Put the arm in vertical configuration to grasp the object
- "h" : Put the arm in horizontal configuration to grasp the object
- "o": Open the gripper
- "c": Close the gripper
- "w": Move the mobile platform forward
- "s": Move the mobile platform backward
- "a": Move the mobile platform to the left
- "d": Move the mobile platform to the right
- "r": Reset the grasping box and the robot
